Name: Wisdom
About the game: Wisdom is a breakthrough in science education that explains the effects of psychedelics on the brain within the predictive coding neuroscience framework. In Wisdom you can hold the psilocybin molecule and fit it into the receptor and you can even experience and understand how synesthesia happens. Donâ€™t forget to dance while you're learning!
